title: Design Management Capacity-Building Program for Product Innovation in SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Concepts in Organizational Learning and Innovation Management
context.additional_context: Experiencing SME product development environments via VR simulations and utilizing structural equation modeling analysis tools.

learning_goals: Explain the impact of organizational learning capability on product innovation performance from a design management perspective.
Analyze SME innovation processes using structural equation modeling.
Propose strategies to improve product development performance by 20% or more by applying design management strategies in simulation environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
